mainHero.title: Code for
mainHero.subtitle: Singapore.
mainHero.description: Behind the ones and zeros, there's a heart that builds with purpose.

items.title: Build for Good
items.description: Always ideating, always solving — we code with purpose for the people. With empathy at our core, we build for the elderly, the vulnerable, and those often left behind. This is software for social good, rooted in Singapore's communities. We don’t just build apps — we build hope, access, and opportunity.

items.title: From Code to Community
items.description: We create inclusive technology that uplifts the underserved in Singapore — from seniors to everyday citizens. Our tools are crafted for real needs, with real people in mind. By combining thoughtful code with local action, we aim to drive meaningful change. This is tech that matters.

projects.title: Latest & greatest
projects.subtitle: Projects That Make a Difference
projects.description: Explore how we turn ideas into impact. These projects showcase the power of code when it’s built for people, purpose, and progress.

items.name: SaltRice
items.description: Reducing social isolation in elderly by giving them the opportunity to share their life lessons with the community.

items.name: MESA
items.description: Through the use of devices, provide relevant alerts to Caregivers so that in the event of accidents, or scheduled medication intake, they will be notified.

items.name: Wiser
items.description: Enable interaction and monitoring without the need of social workers' physical presence.

items.name: RecyclingBeans
items.description: To collect real time data of trash within recycle bins so that the community will better understand behaviors and patterns and better shape policies and habits for a better environment

items.name: WaterSense
items.description: To build a system that provides personalized, detailed water usage to households to advocate for good water saving habits.

items.name: SMART
items.description: Record daily water usage trends of households and use the data to motivate behavior change.
